Half computer geek. Half sports addict.

Minimalist. Passioned of Software Engineering and Design. I hold a BSc in Audiovisual Systems Engineering issued by the Terrassa School of Engineering (EET) (UPC) in Spain.

Always learning.

I do a little bit of everything but what I enjoy the most is building quality software that scales. I love startups and I prefer to work with highly motivated people with passion when building something amazing. Clean and Solid are my top words in the dictionary.
